attributes.action: get rid of the Silica (carrot,)   on big lamp corner  in weston-super-mare
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A structure known as Silica was installed at Big Lamp Corner during 2006. It is a tall ugly looking structure  which include  an advertising sign, a retail kiosk selling newspapers and hot food, as well as a bus shelter. It has been criticised by local residents who nicked named it the carrot and turnept  according to ugly shape .the councille spent a huge amuont of money on this useless and ugly  building,it should of been spent on imporving the town .it fare they wanted to fill the space up but a water fountian  would of been fine . 

picture of the ugly building http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/a/a8/Westernsilica.JPG

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
